source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_RELATED_PARTY_TRANSACTION_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Incident]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Transaction_Date as date,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as decimal(19,4),
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalRelaterPartyTransaction
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalRelaterPartyTransaction derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Transaction_Date,Related_Parties_Involved,Transaction_Description,Transaction_Size,How_Managed,Mutual_Benefit)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Transaction_ID = Transaction_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Transaction_Date = Transaction_Date,
		Relation_Related_Parties_Involved = Related_Parties_Involved,
		Relation_Transaction_Description = Transaction_Description,
		Relation_Transaction_Size = Transaction_Size,
		Relation_How_Managed = How_Managed,
		Relation_Mutual_Benefit = Mutual_Benefit,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Transaction_Date,Related_Parties_Involved,Transaction_Description,Transaction_Size,How_Managed,Mutual_Benefit)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Transaction_ID == Relation_Transaction_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingRelatedPartyTrx@NewRelated select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Transaction_Date = toDate(Transaction_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Transaction_ID = toInteger(Transaction_ID),
		Transaction_Size = toDecimal(Transaction_Size,19,4,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingRelatedPartyTrx@(NewRelated, ChangedRelated, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingRelatedPartyTrx@ChangedRelated derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID = Relation_Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Transaction_Date as date,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as decimal(19,4),
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Transaction_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@ValidDateAndTransactionID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTransactionID split(not(isNull(Derived_Transaction_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Transaction_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Transaction_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@(ValidDateAndTransactionID, InvalidDateOrTransactionID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Transaction_Date = toDate(Transaction_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Transaction_Id = toInteger(Transaction_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndTransactionID
InvalidDateOrTransactionIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTransactionID
ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@InvalidDateOrTransactionID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Transaction Date / Transaction ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrTransactionIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrTransactionID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
